short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An addon for xstate.js.org/viz which allows writing state machine in simpler language

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows xstate visualzier users to write their statecharts in simpler indent based text language and converts it to the json format which xstate understands
